description: virtual_interface entries are not torn down on delete when under load.  single server builds properly tear down the entry, while a large number of deletes doesn't clean up properly when using Quantum Manager.
title: virtual_interfaces in nova aren't torn down when under load

comments.content: virtual_interface entries are not torn down on delete when under load.  single server builds properly tear down the entry, while a large number of deletes doesn't clean up properly when using Quantum Manager.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~antonym

comments.content: We haven't been able to replicate this. We believe it was an issue with a Quantum plugin that has been resolved.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jason-koelker
